column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love tapas! Because instead of ordering one entree you get to try and share many small dishes with your party. New Year's Day - they were all well done. My favorites were the baked goat cheese with tomato sauce and toasted garlic bread
column2: the brussle sprouts salad with manchego and toasted almond (omg)
column4: pepper flake and olive oil... It was a great way to spend 3 hours. Good wine selection by the glass.  I don't normally like sangria because it's too sweet
column5: but I tasted everybody's red and it was deelish!  Our server Matt was phenomenal and I can't wait to go back again soon!
